data.Name: Habstrakt
data.Bio: Coming from the South of France, Adam a.k.a Habstrakt was a guitar and keys player before turning his mind onto samplers and grooveboxes very early. He first got into Trip Hop and also wrote music for movies & even theater, but in 2008 he discovered dubstep and drum n bass music, and immediately got involved in production and DJ'ing. Four years later his tracks are welcomed by many established labels such as Buygore and Never Say Die. Those releases Read more on Last.fm
